content: this pattern is published for free in my blog the natura water bottle holder is necessary for those active days a one seamless piece design to practice in the round crochet with super easy stitches that create a nice open weave so fast to make and adaptable for medium size liquid containers **finished size** 4 3 x 8 3 / 11 cm x 21 cm **suggested materials** - one 100 gr / 3 5 oz 160 m / 174 yd skein of bulky weight 60% cotton 40% acrylic yarn in cream or lilac - 4 5 mm g-7 crochet hook - stitch marker - measuring tape - scissors **skill level** easy this design includes basic crochet stitches simple shaping and finishing techniques **stitches and techniques** slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet **design attributes** worked in the round worked in one seamless piece pattern attributes round by round instructions written pattern photo tutorial showing important steps of the process when you buy one of my patterns you will be able to download the english and/or spanish pdf versions materials are not included finished products based on my patterns may be sold in small quantity giving me credit for the design as chabepatterns and promoting your products using your own photos want to buy more than one pattern there are special discounts buy 2 patterns together and get 10% off discount coupon code 10percentoff buy 3 patterns together and get 15% off discount coupon code 15percentoff buy 4 patterns together and get 20% off discount coupon code 20percentoff buy 5 patterns together and get 25% off discount coupon code 25percentoff add the patterns you want to buy to your cart and before checking out select the coupon code option then enter the correct code that applies please note i can t apply a discount after payment is completed
